main module¶

main.main()¶

Runs game from stacks.txt file and finds solution

As i’m still optimizing, I’m printing the game on each step

main.minimax(position: Game.Game, depth: int) → int¶

The “max” part of the minimax function

SixTowers doesn’t actually have an opponent (or minimizing players), so probing and additional optimizations are not available

Parameters

  • position (Game.Game) – Game to use to begin testing alternatives

  • depth (int) – Current depth of the: Current depth of recursion

Returns

Maximum static evaluation after a testing all alternatives

Return type

number(int)
